analysis.description:
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0xa581b8dac454842ff92ca92ff4e2544e1b36e6ab.sol#63)
Exchange.tokenPerETH should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0xa581b8dac454842ff92ca92ff4e2544e1b36e6ab.sol#91-92)
